speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from Delta Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing okay, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding your account with Freshbank. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to handle this?

speaker: Customer
text: I’d like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course. We can set up a plan over the next three months. Does that work for you?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I’ll send you the details via email. Thank you for your time today.

speaker: Agent
text: You’re welcome! Have a great day!
